dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
From: "Angela Curtis - Africa Insites" <angela@africa-insites.com>
To: "'The Google Team'" <help@google.com>
Date: Jul, 7/11/2011 10:54
Subject: RE: [#828173311] DMCA Notice Web Form Submission: Africa Insites
Ticket Id: 828173311

Hi Google Team

Thanks for your email. Yes, I can provide more helpful info regarding my

complaint about this massive copyright infringement. However, I don't have

copyright registration numbers. But I do have a copyright notice on all my

pages saying the content is onwed by me and cannot be copied without my

permission. 


I am a freelance writer and web designer. I travelled the country of Zambia

at my own expense and researched and wrote the text that is on my website

www.zambiatourism.com 


www.zambiatravelguide.com and also www.ezambia.com (same people) have

basically copied every single page of mine and created competitive sites -

with my words - word for word! Occasionally they leave off the first

sentence but 99.9% of the text is mine. You will see they have often used

my pictures too!


Here is a list of a few examples - my page and then their corresponding

page on both their other sites. It really should not be allowed and they

are ignoring my request to change their text. You are my only hope !



MINE: http://www.zambiatourism.com/travel/places/victoria.htm 

THEIRS: http://www.zambiatravelguide.com/victoria-falls.html 

THEIR OTHER SITE:

http://www.ezambia.com/component/content/article/34-places-to-visit/54-
victo

ria-falls.html 



MINE: http://www.zambiatourism.com/travel/nationalparks/sluangwa.htm 

THEIRS: http://www.zambiatravelguide.com/-south-luangwa.html 

THEIR OTHER SITE:

http://www.ezambia.com/component/content/article/37-game-reserves/50-south-
l

uangwa.html 



MINE: http://www.zambiatourism.com/travel/nationalparks/kafue.htm 

THEIRS: http://www.zambiatravelguide.com/kafue.html 

THEIR OTHER SITE:

http://www.ezambia.com/component/content/article/37-game-reserves/74-kafue-
n

ational-park.html 


MINE: http://www.zambiatourism.com/travel/traveladvice/general.htm 

THEIRS: http://www.zambiatravelguide.com/general-info-at-a-glance.html 

THEIR OTHER SITE:

http://www.ezambia.com/component/content/article/46-travel-guide/112-
general

-info-at-a-glance.html 


MINE: http://www.zambiatourism.com/travel/hisgeopeop/people.htm 

THEIRS:

http://www.zambiatravelguide.com/travel-guide/162-people-of-zambia.html 

THEIR OTHER SITE:

http://www.ezambia.com/component/content/article/46-travel-guide/162-people-

of-zambia.html 


And so it goes on, they have copied over 150 pages of my text and listings,

and simply copied it into theirs, using my pictures, my headings, my

structure. 



I have also heard that my site may be penalised (ie lose rank or result

position?) for having text that is duplicated on other sites - is this
true?



Many thanks for your time and consideration


Kind regards

Angie
